text: Jon Østeng Hov (23 January 1936 − 29 March 2019) was a Norwegian photographer and writer. He was known for his nature photos. He was a columnist for the Adresseavisen newspaper for over 30 years. Hov was an honorary member of the Norwegian Society for the Conservation of Nature. In 2005, he was made Knight, 1st Class of the Order of St. Olav. Hov died on 29 March 2019, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Columnists Category:Conservation Category:Norwegian writers Category:Photographers Category:Norwegian artists
title: Jon Østeng Hov
